description:
You live a peaceful life with your cave wife as an ordinary cave man in a cave. But one day the Neanderthals attack you.

Your house is destroyed, your WIFE IS TAKEN AWAY. Dave is the name of your enemy.

Everything changes when you find a SHOTGUN! Kill all Daves. Bring back your wife. Become the King of the Stone Age!

P.S. No saves, no hints, only hardcore.

Made by Team Random Guys

- Asher Blair (100MM CANNON): 3D Modeling / Animations

- Aleksandr Kasatov (KosmoDED): Level Design / Cutscenes

- Mike Wu (mikewu63): Programming / UI
